title: Jane Needs Cookies
cleaned_text: Cookies are a technical requirement for you to interact with Jane. A cookie is a small encrypted file that lets Jane identify you as you click around. The cookie does not contain any sensitive personal information. You may need to set your browser to accept cookies from this site. [Here is a helpful site](http://www.whatarecookies.com/enable.asp) with instructions on how to enable cookies in your browser. To find out more about how cookies are used on this site, you can read
